00055         MarkupText::MarkupText(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Whole Glyph, String Text, UILayer* Layer)
00056             : Parent(Layer),
00057               RelPosition(Position),
00058               RelSize(Vector2(0,0)),
00059               Name(name)
00060         {
00061             Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00062 
00063             Vector2 Window = Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00064             GMarkup = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createMarkupText(Glyph,Position.X * Window.X,Position.Y * Window.Y,Text);
00065         }
00066 
00067         MarkupText::~MarkupText()
00068         {
00069             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyMarkupText(GMarkup);
00070         }
00071 
00072         void MarkupText::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00073         {
00074             GMarkup->SetVisible(Visible);
00075         }
00076 
00077         bool MarkupText::IsVisible()
00078         {
00079             return GMarkup->IsVisible();
00080         }
00081 
00082         void MarkupText::Show()
00083         {
00084             GMarkup->Show();
00085         }
00086 
00087         void MarkupText::Hide()
00088         {
00089             GMarkup->Hide();
00090         }
00091

00093         {
00094             return Name;
00095         }
00096 
00097         void MarkupText::SetText(String& Text)
00098         {
00099             GMarkup->text(Text);
00100         }

00103         {

00118         {
00119             Glyphs = DefaultGlyphIndex;
00120             GMarkup->SetDefaultGlyphIndex(DefaultGlyphIndex);

00168         void MarkupText::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00169         {
00170             RelPosition = Position;
00171             Vector2 CurrDim = Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00172             GMarkup->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00173             GMarkup->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00174         }
00175 
00176         Vector2 MarkupText::GetPosition()
00177         {
00178             return RelPosition;
00179         }
00180 
00181         void MarkupText::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00182         {
00183             GMarkup->left(Position.X);
00184             GMarkup->top(Position.Y);
00185         }
00186 
00187         Vector2 MarkupText::GetActualPosition()
00188         {
00189             Vector2 Pos(GMarkup->left(), GMarkup->top());
00190             return Pos;
00191         }
00192 
00193         void MarkupText::SetMaxSize(const Vector2 Size)
00194         {
00195             RelSize = Size;
00196             Vector2 CurrDim = Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00197             GMarkup->width(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00198             GMarkup->height(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00199         }
00200 
00201         Vector2 MarkupText::GetMaxSize()
00202         {
00203             return RelSize;
00204         }
00205 
00206         void MarkupText::SetMaxActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00207         {
00208             RelSize = Size / Parent->GetParent()->GetViewportDimensions();
00209             GMarkup->width(Size.X);
00210             GMarkup->height(Size.Y);
00211         }
00212 
00213         Vector2 MarkupText::GetMaxActualSize()
00214         {
00215             Vector2 Pos(GMarkup->width(), GMarkup->height());
00216             return Pos;
00217         }
00218 
00219         void MarkupText::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00220         {
00221             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00222             switch(Priority)
00223             {
00224                 case UI::RP_Low:
00225                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00226                     break;
00227                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00228                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00229                     break;
00230                 case UI::RP_High:
00231                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00232                     break;
00233                 default:
00234                     break;
00235             }
00236             GMarkup->RenderPriority(RP);
00237         }
00238 
00239         UI::RenderPriority MarkupText::GetRenderPriority()
00240         {
00241             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GMarkup->RenderPriority();
00242             switch(RP)
00243             {
00244                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00245                     return UI::RP_Low;
00246                     break;
00247                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00248                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00249                     break;
00250                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00251                     return UI::RP_High;
00252                     break;
00253                 default:
00254                     break;
00255             }
00256             return UI::RP_Medium;
00257         }
00258     }//UI
